players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. Charlie: remained silent."
You: "Will do, Charlie. Stay alert."
Bob: "Charlie, be cautious. Alice, stay vigilant."
Bob: "Charlie, stay hidden. Alice, trust votes."
Charlie: "Bob, watch Alice closely. Charlie: remained silent."
You: "Charlie and Bob showed concern, hinting at potential mafia. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. Charlie: remained silent."
Alice: "Will do, Charlie. Stay alert."
You: "Charlie, be cautious. Alice, stay vigilant."
You: "Charlie, stay hidden. Alice, trust votes."
Charlie: "Bob, watch Alice closely. Charlie: remained silent."
Alice: "Charlie and Bob showed concern, hinting at potential mafia. Stay cautious."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice. Charlie: remained silent."
Alice: "Will do, Charlie. Stay alert."
Bob: "Charlie, be cautious. Alice, stay vigilant."
Bob: "Charlie, stay hidden. Alice, trust votes."
You: "Bob, watch Alice closely. Charlie: remained silent."
Alice: "Charlie and Bob showed concern, hinting at potential mafia. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
